actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the dollar amount which is required before certain gambling winnings are subject to income tax withholding.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $5,000 the amount of gambling winnings that are not subject to withholding of income tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the dollar amount which is required before certain gambling winnings are subject to income tax withholding.
